subject: Order Status and Shipping Inquiry
description_text:
Dear Customer Service,

I'm writing to inquire about the status of my order SSN2784. I've been
waiting for a long time and I'm not sure when it will arrive. If the
shipping is going to take much longer, I'd prefer to cancel the order and
receive a full refund.

Could you please let me know the status and options available?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards, Pezzotti Cristian

conversations.body_text: Hi Cristian Pezzotti,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in shipping your order. We have just concluded our 8-day holiday period. We have arranged for DHL express delivery from our German warehouse and will ship your order next Monday. It is expected to arrive on the 16th. We apologize for any inconvenience caused!

That's great, thank you very much.
